lead_paragraph: The seeds for many of the 25, maybe 30, medals the U.S. track team hopes to win in Rio de Janeiro were planted at a training center in California with the help of technology originally designed for golf.

headline.print_headline: Computers, Technology Help US Track and Field Go for Gold
headline.main: Computers, Technology Help US Track and Field Go for Gold
